title: Tokyo - Imperial Palace
content:
Today we had a chill start with breakfast in the room - cereal and fruit! There’s a supermarket down the road from our hotel, so we bought some supplies last night. Turns out this was a great decision, and we’ll keep doing it when we can so we can take it easy and enjoy breakfast :)

First stop was the Imperial Palace - there were a few people there but not really heaps. With less people it really shows how big the grounds are - so much open space. Everything is big - walls, gates, moats - it’s impressive to think how long ago these things were made.

See part 2 for Odaiba and the rest of the day!
